Class BookTest

java.lang.Object
BookTest
class BookTest
extends java.lang.Object
Test class for the Book class that also indirectly tests the Resource class as well.
Author:
James Welsh

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Book book  

  • Constructor Summary

    BookTest()

  • Field Details

    • book

      private Book book

  • Constructor Details

    • BookTest

      BookTest()

  • Method Details

    • testSetLibrary

      @Test void testSetLibrary()
      The test also tests the getLibrary() method as well as setLibrary().

      It tests library cannot be set to null using the function, it can be set to a library object and that it can be change to another library object once library is already set as a library object.

    • testsetResourceId

      @Test void testsetResourceId()
      The test tests the getResourceId method as well as setResourceId().

      Tests the initialised value, then that it handles strings of less than and more than 8 characters. Finally tests that an acceptable value is accepted and the resourceId data member is updated.

    • testSetTitle

      @Test void testSetTitle()
      The test tests the getTitle() method as well as setTitle().

      Tests the initialised value before modifying the title and testing again.

    • testSetAuthor

      @Test void testSetAuthor()
      The test tests the getAuthor() method as well as setAuthor().

      Tests the initialised value before modifying the author and testing again.

    • testSetPublicationYear

      @Test void testSetPublicationYear()
      The tests tests getPublicationYear() as well as setPublicationYear().

      Tests the initial value before then testing that both positive and negative years are accepted.

    • testSetNumberOfPages

      @Test void testSetNumberOfPages()
      The test tests getnumberOfPages() as well as setNumberOfPages().

      Tests the initial value before testing that the number of pages cannot be negative or zero. Finally it tests that for a positive integer numberOfPages is updated.

    • testSetISBN

      @Test void testSetISBN()
      Tests getISBN() as well as setISBN().

      Tests the initial value before updating it and testing again.

    • testSetEdition

      @Test void testSetEdition()
      Tests getEdition as well as setEdition().

      Tests the initialised value before testing that it works for all editions 1 to 13 and it doesn't allow zero or negative editions. It then chooses a few random edition integers.

    • testSetCurrentHolder

      @Test void testSetCurrentHolder()
      This test tests both getCurrentHolder() and isAvailable() as well as setCurrentHolder().

      Tests book cannot be set to null, it can be set if a member belonging to the same library as the book attempts to take it out and the book is available. It also tests that both book and member have to belong to the library and that the member cannot be changed if book is currently out on loan.

    • testAddDamages

      @Test void testAddDamages()
      Tests the addDamages() and the getDamages methods.

      Tests the initial value, that the initial damage can be set and then that subsequent damages are appended and separated by a comma.

    • testMakeBookAvailable

      @Test void testMakeBookAvailable()
      Tests the makeBookAvailable() method.

      Tests initial value, sets a new holder and then checks that the function successfully sets the currentHolder to null.
